attributes.action: Allow Stanley Forbes to perform his "Love Letter To Tony Blair" in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stanley Forbes is Britain's greatest satirist, and his Love Letter To Tony Blair" is the greatest song ever made by anyone, ever. As Mr Blair is leaving office soon, it is only right and proper that he be given a fitting send off by one of his greatest fans. myspace.com/stanleyforbes

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
